subject: Some initial tests of 25 (the PCB version).
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_4d4d_fa1_de
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

Randy went halfers on these boards, so I thought it was at least 
sychronistic to get a voice about a Randy. I was holding a probe on the 
audio output of the radio chip, which went to a boombox. I was recording 
directly from the speaker while manually tuning across the FM band. I'm 
still missing one part for the AM.

BTW, Alexander MacCrea, in Scotland I think, uses almost the exact same 
sound chamber as I do, and we've never discussed it. He calls his the Lynx.

Frank-S
